actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To authorize the National Park Service to undertake the necessary feasibility studies to establish certain new units of the National Park System in the State of Hawaii.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the National Park Service, to study and report to the Congress on the feasibility of establishing National Park System units in specified areas of Hawaii.

titles.title: To authorize the National Park Service to undertake the necessary feasibility studies to establish certain new units of the National Park System in the State of Hawaii.
